src:
Slagigt på Stockholmsbörsen – Securitas stiger på rapport
Stockholmsbörsen har inlett handelsdagen slagigt. Delårsrapporterna satte färg på handeln där Securitas steg till toppen bland storbolagen och medicinteknikföretaget Vitrolife rusade, medan vinstvarnande Raysearch rasade lite längre ner i listorna. 
06 Nov 2019, 09:39 by Nyhetsbyrån Direkt, Di

text:
Shameful on the Stockholm Stock Exchange - Securitas rises on report
The Stockholm Stock Exchange has started trading day badly. The interim reports put color on the trade, with Securitas rising to the top among the big companies and medical technology company Vitrolife rushing, while profit-alert Raysearch crashed a little further down the lists.
06 Nov 2019, 09:39 by News Agency Direct, Tue.
